thread.section_title: SEA Gamer Mall Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SEA Gamer Mall | seagm.com | 6 of 10
thread.title: Taylor Paladichuk
thread.title_full: SEA Gamer Mall reviewed by Taylor Paladichuk

author: Taylor Paladichuk
title: Taylor Paladichuk
text: I've rarely found this degree of service in a goldseller. Their live chat is excellent; attentive, comprehensive, and possess a sense of immediacy. When I've had problems placing orders they've been a huge help, and they didn't hesitate to refund my order when I placed it incorrectly. On top of their bulk discounts and competitive prices, they are fast on delivery and seem to have a good stock on hand! Highly recommend this service.
